card.title: Welcome
card.text: Welcome to the fates Skill. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

voice.intro: Welcome to the fates Skill. To learn how to use this skill, say "Help".

card.title: Welcome
card.text: You were visited in a dream states by elders called the ancient ones. You have a quest that will test your mind, body, and spirit.  To start the journey choose the type of magic to use, fire or water.  Say fire or water.

voice.intro: You woke to find yourself visited by the ancient ones who have a quest for you.  To start the journey choose the type of magic to use, fire or water.  Say fire or water.

card.title: You Lose
card.text: Better luck next time.
card.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "start again." Otherwise you can say "exit skill."

voice.intro: Better luck next time.
voice.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "start again." Otherwise you can say "exit skill."

card.title: Room
card.text: You enter a room. There does not appear to be a way out of this room. Say go back to try again.

voice.intro: You enter a room. There does not appear to be a way out of this room. Say go back to try again.

card.title: Hall
card.text: That is the hall you came from.

voice.intro: That is the hall you came from.

card.title: Ring 1
card.text:
You find the first ring, the ring of magic.  To retrieve the ring you must answer this riddle.

I am tall. when I am young. and short. when I am old.  Who am I?
card.prompt: For a hint. I am used for light.

voice.intro:
You find the first ring, the ring of magic.  To retrieve the ring you must answer this riddle.

I am tall. when I am young. and short. when I am old.  Who am I?
voice.prompt: For a hint. I am used for light.

card.title: Fire Mission
card.text: You retrieve the ring of magic.  Suddenly you hear the ancients in your mind. To journey further you will need to climb fire mountain.  Say fire missison to begin.

voice.intro: You retrieve the ring of magic.  Suddenly you hear the ancients in your mind. To journey further you will need to climb fire mountain.  Say fire missison to begin.

card.title: Fire Path
card.text: You chose fire. You are sent to a maze where you see a few paths, one going towards lava, in another direction a torch, and to the right, a fire bridge.  Which way would you like to go, say lava, torch, or, fire bridge.

voice.intro: You chose fire. You are sent to a maze where you see a few paths, one going towards lava, in another direction a torch, and to the right, a fire bridge.  Which way would you like to go, say lava, torch, or, fire bridge.

card.title: Water Path
card.text: You chose water. You are sent to a maze where you see a few paths, one going towards a pond, in another direction a fountain, and to the right, a water bridge.  Which way would you like to go, say pond, fountain, or, water bridge.

voice.intro: You chose water. You are sent to a maze where you see a few paths, one going towards a pond, in another direction a fountain, and to the right, a water bridge.  Which way would you like to go, say pond, fountain, or, water bridge.

card.title: Room
card.text: That is the room you came from.

voice.intro: That is the room you came from.

card.title: Wall
card.text: There is a wall. Say go back to try again.

voice.intro: There is a wall. Say go back to try again.

card.title: You lose
card.text: Better luck next time.
card.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "start again." Otherwise you can say "exit skill."

voice.intro: Better luck next time.
voice.prompt: If you would like to play again say, "start again." Otherwise you can say "exit skill."

card.title: Ring 1
card.text:
You find the first ring, the ring of magic. To retrieve the ring you must answer this riddle.

I am the son of water. but when I return to water. I die.  Who am I?
card.prompt: For a hint: I am a form of water

card.title: Fire Mountain
card.text: You come to fire mountain. You see 2 paths, fire cliff 1, and fire trail 1. Which way do you want to go?  Say fire cliff one, or say, fire trail 1.

voice.intro: You come to fire mountain. You see 2 paths, fire cliff 1, and fire trail 1. Which way do you want to go?  Say fire cliff one, or say, fire trail 1.

card.title: Water Mountain
card.text: You come to water mountain. You see 2 paths, water cliff 1, and water trail 1. Which way do you want to go?  Say water cliff 1, or say, fire trail 1.

card.title: Ring 2
card.text:
Walking up the third trail you find a little chest at the end. Inside is another ring, the ring of knowledge.

An elder named Temptress came to you with a warning. You can be rewarded now with vast material wealth or in the next life with spiritual welath.

voice.intro:
